subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Kimi Raikkonen drove Ferrari to its third consecutive Formula One victory, winning the Spanish Grand Prix in Barcelona. Raikkonen, a 28-year-old from Finland, won his 17th race, finishing 3.228 seconds ahead of his teammate Felipe Massa of Brazil. Raikkonen is 9 points ahead of McLaren’s Lewis Hamilton atop the drivers standings.
